DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age Diagnosis multiple myeloma nonHodgkin lymphoma Eligible autologous transplantation Adequate bone marrow function define : White Blood Cell Count ≥ 3.0x109/L Absolute Neutrophil Count ≥ 1.5x109/L Platelet Count ≥ 100x109/L Able understand willing sign IRBapproved inform consent document Surgically biologically sterile willing practice acceptable birth control , follow : Women childbearing potential must negative serum urine pregnancy test within 7 day Day 1 study treatment . Women childbearing potential must agree abstain sexual activity use medically approve contraceptive measure/regimen 3 month treatment period . Acceptable method birth control include : barrier ( condom ) , oral contraceptive , intrauterine device ( IUD ) , transdermal/implanted injected contraceptive , abstinence Males must agree abstain sexual activity agree utilize medically approve contraception method 3 month treatment period .
